results.title: Effect of lisinopril on renal tissue damage in unilateral ureteral obstruction in rats.

results.title: TCV-116 inhibits interstitial fibrosis and HSP47 mRNA in rat obstructive nephropathy.
results.text_hl: HSP47 and type I collagen mRNA levels in the @CHEMICAL_candesartan_cilexetil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C077793 @@@TCV-116@@@- or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-treated groups were reduced to about 60% of untreated @<m>DISEASE_Ureteral_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014517 @@@UUO@@@.

citations.NLM: Moriyama T, Kawada N, Akagi Y, Ando A, Horio M, Yamauchi A, Nagata K, Imai E, Hori M. TCV-116 inhibits interstitial fibrosis and HSP47 mRNA in rat obstructive nephropathy. Kidney Int Suppl. 1997 Dec;63():S232-5. PMID: 9407468
